settings.content:
REINFORCE YOUR MANHOOD WITH WHOLE PACKAGE

Beef organs are nutrient-dense and provide a wide array of essential vitamins and minerals. Our Whole Package supplement is packed with vital nutrients and peptides to provide support for exercise performance, hormone production, and sexual health.

settings.text: 100% Hormone, Antibiotic, Pesticide, and GMO Free

settings.organ_info_desc: Liver is the single most nutritious natural food on the planet, both in terms of density and variety. It is incredibly rich in vitamins, minerals, peptides and enzymes to support immune, reproductive, digestive, musculoskeletal, and nervous health.

Testicle provides tissue-specific nutrients, proteins, and peptides—like activin, inhibin, and epidermal growth factor—all of which play a vital role in the formation of our sex hormones, reproductive cells, and fertility.

Whole Blood Extract includes red and white blood cells, platelets, and plasma. Each contains critical nutrients such as electrolytes, iron, Vitamin D, and hormones that help regulate inflammation and the production of healthy blood.

settings.content:
UNLOCK THE POWER OF ORGANS

Beef organs are the most nutrient-dense and bioavailable foods on the planet. By incorporating these potent sources of essential nutrients into your diet, you can finally address lingering nutrient inadequacies and deficiencies, paving the way for a remarkable transformation in how you feel and function.

settings.review:
Amazing stuff...

I combine, mix and matching them to take 6 pill total a day with my breakfast complementing my diet. Loving the animal based journey, can’t stop talking about it to my friends.”

settings.review:
Profoundly effective...

This stuff will change your life! After taking whole package supplements (for 4+ months) my body has greatly improved. I have new levels of strength and endurance, along with muscle size and vascularity increases! My libido is through the roof and my energy levels have improved immensely... it’s nothing short of miraculous!

settings.review:
Must have for men’s health...

“I can’t not express how great this product has been! Have been taking whole package for about a month now and it has been a great addition to my daily routine and health. If your a middle aged man looking to improve your health it would be a mistake to not add this into your regimen.”

settings.review:
Better mood...

Since starting these supplements, along with feeling better physically, I’ve also noticed having a better frame of mind. At work or just dealing with the kids I just have a general clearer picture. Hard to explain but I feel great... mixed with meats, dairy and exercise I’ve never felt better.
settings.name: Richard

settings.info:
Daily Routine Made Easy

 Our freeze-drying process preserves key nutrients in a taste-free capsule that’s easy for anyone to take. Because it’s simply real food, it can be taken with or without a meal.

Heart & Soil Standard 

Rigorous third-party testing. No junk or fillers, sourced from regenerative farms, and free from pesticides, GMO and antibiotics.

A Powerhouse of Nutrition 

Critical nutrients, peptides, and growth factors in one powerful supplement. Improve your overall health, vitality, mood, exercise performance, and energy.

For Anyone Seeking Radical Health 

Accessible to anyone and everyone seeking radical health and vitality.

6 CAPSULES A DAY. 
REAL FOOD. REAL RESULTS.
